author: Garrett M. Graff
title: 'Here in Spirit': An Oral History of Faith Amid the Pandemic
description: As Passover unfolds and Easter approaches, Jews and Christians are re-examining religion in the absence of physical gatherings.
content: Today is Good Friday, the day Christians commemorate Jesus crucifixion. For Jews, Wednesday night marked the beginning of Passover, the spring holiday celebrating the liberation of the Israelites from Egypt. Normally both sets of holidays are packed with fami… [+7466 chars]
